tasks.task: Picking up pigs and moving them to a trailer
subtasks: Deciding to move the pigs due to upcoming rain
Transporting pigs from their current location to the trailer
Ensuring pigs are comfortable in the trailer
Providing straw, food, and water in the trailer
Confirming the pigs will be harvested in a week
Ensuring the pasture is too wet for future access
Moving pigs to a sheltered area for the duration of rainy weather
Checking the pigs' health and wellbeing during the move

tasks.task: Relocating pigs to trailer to avoid wet pasture conditions
subtasks: Assessing the pasture's ground conditions as too wet for trailer access
Herding pigs from their current location to the trailer
Loading pigs safely into the trailer, ensuring they are properly restrained
Securing pigs in the trailer to prevent injury during transport
Adding straw, food, and water to the trailer for the pigs' comfort during transit
Monitoring the pigs' well-being during the relocation and adjustment to the trailer
